name: Ermiyas Hailemichael
bio: As a software engineer student at GA, have a strong skill set in various programming languages including HTML, CSS, Python, Java, and JavaScript. I also have experience with libraries and frameworks such as React, Bootstrap, NodeJS, and Express. I am proficient in using databases like MongoDB and have experience with tools like JSON API, MERN stack, Postman, and Git/GitHub. In addition, I am proficient in a variety of enterprise software, including Google Suite, Microsoft Office, Slack, Zoom, and Adobe Suite. I am also fluent in Amharic and have strong communication skills. My professional experience includes completing a software engineering immersive program at General Assembly, where I developed a portfolio of individual and group projects using Git/GitHub, Heroku, and Netlify. I have also worked as a coding instructor, where I prepared and delivered lessons to kids and provided feedback on their progress. I have additional professional experience as a service technician and sales associate. I am currently pursuing an associate's degree in computer science at Seattle Central College.
